title: BlogZone-CLG
description: A modern blogging platform where users can create accounts, publish posts, manage their blogs, and explore content from multiple categories.

title: Rixn Tweaks UI
description: A clean and customizable UI design system showcasing modern components, layouts, and interactive elements for frontend projects.

title: Critic Score
description: A rating and review application where users can explore items, view detailed scores, and access an organized review system.

title: CityCare
description: A cleanliness awareness project designed to encourage users to contribute to a cleaner environment through simple and engaging content.

title: Eshoply
description: A feature-rich e-commerce platform offering product browsing, real-time filtering, cart management, product details, and a seamless user shopping experience.
